name: Telekinesis
description:
Force metamagic; restores HP to target Force Wall instead of dealing damage to it.

On hit, after combat, choose a cardinal direction and apply one of the following modes:
 • Move target up to one space in that direction then deal 20% nonlethal damage to a foe adjacent to target in that direction.
 • Move target up to two spaces that direction
@{const:variant:Pugni Variant:} Increase maximum movement of each mode by one, and nonlethal damage by 20%.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
